name: Pollo al Ajillo (Chicken and Garlic)
author: Bev
summary: Chock full of garlic, this dish from the Castilian region of Spain is delish!!!  Served with a salad and crusty French bread, it is sure to please.
ingredients: ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil
1 (3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces
1 pound potatoes, peeled and cut into large chunks
directions: In a large covered skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat
Cook chicken in oil until browned on all sides
Arrange potatoes in the skillet to cover the bottom
Place chicken on top of garlic and potatoes
Sprinkle pepper, salt, and parsley over chicken
Pour sherry and port over all
Cover, and simmer over low heat until potatoes and chicken are cooked through, approximately 45 minutes
